content.question: Which of the following statements are illustrated by the data in table?

choices.label: The Silent Generation is more likely to say they have become more liberal over time politically than Millennials.
Millennials are more likely to say they have become more liberal politically over time than Baby Boomers.
Generation X is more likely to say their political views have not changed or been mixed over time compared to the Silent Generation.
Baby Boomers are more likely to say they have become more conservative politically over time than the Silent Generation.

content.answer: Millennials are more likely to say they have become more liberal politically over time than Baby Boomers.
